## NetworkMetrics.fetch\_state\_summary property

A summary of the fetch queue.

The fetch queue is used to retrieve op data based on op ids that have been discovered through publish or gossip.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fetch_state_summary: FetchStateSummary;
```
